meanings.definition: A person who maintains or repairs railway tracks.
meanings.sent1: The fettlers worked hard to keep the railway tracks safe for trains.
meanings.sent2: The team of fettlers inspected the railway tracks for any damage.
meanings.sent3: The fettlers joked that they were like doctors for the railway tracks.
meanings.sent4: The fettlers were the unsung heroes of the railway, silently ensuring smooth journeys.
meanings.sent5: Every morning, the fettlers would start their day by checking the tracks meticulously.

meanings.definition: A group of workers responsible for maintaining railway tracks.
meanings.sent1: The fettlers gathered their tools to begin their work on the railway tracks.
meanings.sent2: The fettlers coordinated their efforts to cover all sections of the railway.
meanings.sent3: The fettlers celebrated completing a big project by having a picnic on the tracks.
meanings.sent4: The fettlers were like a well-oiled machine, ensuring the tracks were always in top condition.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the fettlers' hammers echoed through the railway yard as they worked.
